English:
Yesterday morning, the metropolitan police
launched an on-site investigation into Kamishiro
Enterprises, operator of the EDEN Network.
Chinese:
昨日某時──
負責經營EDEN網路的神代企業
遭到警方搜查。
Korean:
어제 새벽――
EDEN 네트워크를 운영하는 카미시로 엔터프라이즈가
경찰의 압수수색을 받았다는 사실이 밝혀졌습니다
German:
Am gestrigen Morgen begann die Tokioer Polizei vor
Ort eine Ermittlung gegen Kamishiro Enterprises,
den Betreiber des EDEN-Netzwerks.

English: So about Kishibe... What was she anyway?
Chinese: 結果……岸部到底是什麼人啊？
German: Also, wegen Kishibe ... Was war sie überhaupt?

English: Hey, did you manage to reach Ryuji?
I wonder if it's really over...?
German: Ob es wohl wirklich vorbei ist ...?

English: Well...I got revenge for Ryuji and Chitose.
Chinese:
……但是，這樣就徹底幫哥哥
和千歲狠狠報仇了喔。
Korean:
……하지만 오빠랑 치토세 대신에,
있는 힘껏 한 방 날릴 수 있었어
German: Nun, ich konnte Ryuji und Chitose rächen.

English: I finally feel like I accomplished something.
Chinese: 總算有完成一件事的感覺了。
Korean: 겨우 한 가지, 무언가를 해낸 기분이 들어
German:
Jetzt fühle ich mich endlich, als hätte ich etwas
erreicht.
